page.title: 17Housing in Our Area.
page.content: There are 5 areas of housing in this study area; 4 are administered by Rotherham and 1 by Sheffield. The Shiregreen estate is part of Sheffield, it is a large council estate built largley in the 1930,s. The houses are a mixture of types.They are built from greyish bricks with pebbledash in some cases. Some are semi_detatched, others in blocks of 3 or 4.Some have been modernised but there appears to be very few privately owned. The Blackburn estate was built in the postwar boom years and remains largely unaltered. However one street was demolished in 1968 to make way for the M.1. Motorway. The houses are practically all semi_detached and council owned.The two other areas are estates which contain privately owned houses.
